preibisch_imagelib2.algorithm.componenttree

Interface Component<T,C extends Component<T,C>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Localizable>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mser, PixelListComponent

    public interface Component<T,C extends Component<T,C>>
extends Iterable<Localizable>
    Represents a connected component and a node in a ComponentTree. The child and parent nodes can be accessed by getChildren() and getParent(). The set of pixels can be accessed by iterating ( Iterable.iterator()) the component. The threshold value that created the component (extremal region) can be obtained by value().
    Author:
    Florian Jug, Tobias Pietzsch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<C> getChildren()
      Get the children of this node in the ComponentTree.
      C getParent()
      Get the parent of this node in the ComponentTree.
      long size()
      Get the number of pixels in the connected component.
      T value()
      Get the image threshold that created the connected component (extremal region).

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable
